title: My forum account says I'm only level 12
body: When I move my mouse over my name anywhere on the forum it says that my league account is only level 12 even though I'm level 30. How do I fix this?

replies.body:
If you need to update/sync your Boards account, just upvote this comment and wait for up to 15 minutes. This should push an update to your Boards profile.

If you're still having problems or have any other questions, please submit a new thread in this sub-board.
Your Boards starts are updated whenever you post, so by posting this thread, your account now shows that you're level 30!

> [{quoted}](name=good4nothin,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=XE4mAV4a,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-02-12T09:50:38.402+0000)
>
> Ooh, let me try :)

Ok, it works for this thread, but not other threads. Other threads still think I'm level 3, not level 26. I'll just blame Riot's forum software.
Mine tells me I'm level 4 on the forums yet I've been level 30 for 2 years now and posted on the forum multiple times before this... weird.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/OCE/ehlo does now show I am level 30, although I still have this message

http://i.imgur.com/b26Ooza.png
Ahhh lol thanks for the clarification
Having the same glitch as you guys are... Mine says i'm level 2 when actually i'm level 16 in game..

> [{quoted}](name=SomeTechGenius,realm=EUW,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=XE4mAV4a,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-07T11:52:29.275+0000)
>
> Having the same glitch as you guys are... Mine says i'm level 2 when actually i'm level 16 in game..

You show as level 16 now!

> [{quoted}](name=DblBaconChseBrgr,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=XE4mAV4a,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-16T16:34:16.551+0000)
>
> does this work?

You show as level 30 for me!

I can't post a reply as it says I need to be level 5 or above - I am level 11.
I am just posting this here to see if Wuks is right as this seems to be the only forum I can post to
Thanks :-)

Nope - didn't work, logged out and back in aswell  :-(
Must lookup every so often to update stuff

**EDIT: Yep - it did work just took about 10 minutes to update - all is good now  :-)**
